mapper.select: select tmp.serverSum as serverSum, tmp.serverOnLineSum as serverOnLineSum, tmp.serverSum - tmp.serverOnLineSum as serverOffLineSum, ifnull(round(tmp.serverOnLineSum / tmp.serverSum, 2) * 100, '100.00') as serverOnLineRate from ( select count(1) as serverSum, ifnull(sum(ms.IS_ONLINE), 0) as serverOnLineSum from MONITOR_SERVER ms) tmp

SELECT S.*, O.OS_NAME, CAST(AVG(1 - CPU.CPU_IDLE)*100 AS DECIMAL(10, 2)) AS CPU_USER_PERCENT, CAST(AVG(MEMORY.MEN_USED_PERCENT)*100 AS DECIMAL(10, 2)) AS MEN_USED_PERCENT, NETCARD.DOWNLOAD_BPS, NETCARD.UPLOAD_BPS, AVERAGE.FIFTEEN AS LOAD_AVERAGE FROM MONITOR_SERVER S LEFT JOIN MONITOR_SERVER_OS O ON O.IP =S.IP LEFT JOIN MONITOR_SERVER_CPU CPU ON CPU.IP = S.IP LEFT JOIN MONITOR_SERVER_MEMORY MEMORY ON MEMORY.IP = S.IP LEFT JOIN MONITOR_SERVER_NETCARD NETCARD ON (NETCARD.IP = S.IP AND NETCARD.ADDRESS = S.IP) LEFT JOIN MONITOR_SERVER_LOAD_AVERAGE AVERAGE ON AVERAGE.IP=S.IP
AND S.IP like concat('%',#{criteria.ip},'%')
AND S.SERVER_NAME like concat('%',#{criteria.serverName},'%')
AND S.IS_ONLINE=#{criteria.isOnline}
AND S.MONITOR_ENV like concat('%',#{criteria.monitorEnv},'%')
AND S.MONITOR_GROUP like concat('%',#{criteria.monitorGroup},'%')
GROUP BY S.ID, S.IP, S.SERVER_NAME, S.SERVER_SUMMARY, S.IS_ONLINE, S.CONN_FREQUENCY, S.INSERT_TIME, S.UPDATE_TIME, O.OS_NAME, NETCARD.DOWNLOAD_BPS, NETCARD.UPLOAD_BPS, AVERAGE.FIFTEEN ORDER BY S.ID
